title: How to Build Your Own Party Lights

steps.headline: Cut the black chart paper into 6 equal squares.
Now stick the paper cups in a line with mouth facing the sheet.
steps.description: Fill up 4*4 i.e. 16 cups to complete the square.

steps.headline: Find some talcum powder and rub it on the back side of the sheet to reveal the cup rings.
Cut out the rings just like the image shows.
Place the cellophane sheet on top and paste it.
Make cube with the 5 square sheets.
Cut out another square and use it as the roof for the cube.
Drop in a bulb and switch it on.
It should now look like this.

text: Cut the black chart paper into 6 equal squares.  Now stick the paper cups in a line with mouth facing the sheet. Fill up 4*4 i.e. 16 cups to complete the square. Make 5 identical squares.  Find some talcum powder and rub it on the back side of the sheet to reveal the cup rings.  Cut out the rings just like the image shows.  Place the cellophane sheet on top and paste it.  Make cube with the 5 square sheets.  Cut out another square and use it as the roof for the cube.  Drop in a bulb and switch it on.  It should now look like this. You are done!
